org.cougaar.core.service
Interface ConfigurationService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConfigurationService.Delegate
public interface ConfigurationService
extends Service

This service provides access to the file system by searching the configuration path.

The standard implementation is backed by the ConfigFinder. See the ConfigFinder javadoc for the default configuration path and configurable system properties.

Nested Class Summary
static class ConfigurationService.Delegate
          Delegate class for easing implementation of Binders, etc

Method Detail

getConfigurationPath

java.util.List getConfigurationPath()
the (immutable) set of configuration URLs used by this Service

locateFile

java.io.File locateFile(java.lang.String filename)
Locate an actual file in the config path. This will skip over elements of org.cougaar.config.path that are not file: urls.

resolveName

java.net.URL resolveName(java.lang.String logicalName)
                         throws java.net.MalformedURLException
Resolve a logical reference to a URL.

Returns:
null if unresolvable.
Throws:
java.net.MalformedURLException

open

java.io.InputStream open(java.lang.String aURL)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Opens an InputStream to access the named file. The file is sought in all the places specified in configPath.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the resource cannot be found.

find

java.net.URL find(java.lang.String aURL)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Attempt to find the URL which would be opened by the open method. Note that this must actually attempt to open the various URLs under consideration, so this is not an inexpensive operation.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

parseXMLConfigFile

org.w3c.dom.Document parseXMLConfigFile(java.lang.String xmlfile)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
Read and parse an XML file somewhere in the configpath

Throws:
java.io.IOException
